title: Social Competency Strengthening Course through Video-based Interactive Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Conducted via non-synchronous LMS in a BYOD environment, with continuous feedback provided through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three coping strategies for social-job situations using video-based modeling and interactive techniques.
Learners can analyze job scenarios by applying the four components of the 4C/ID model: learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, and coaching.
Learners can improve job competencies by 20% or more through peer interactions following the observational-learning stages of the social cognitive model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
